sentence: Seeking to influence a primary in North Carolina's 11th Congressional District, Sen. Thom Tillis (R-N.C.) announced on Thursday that he will endorse state Sen. sentence: If Madison Were Omar To the Editor: Re Police Accuse Lawmaker of Trying to Fly With Gun?
